inclusion.criterion: Age at randomization between 4 and 17 years inclusively
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Pediatric Crohn's Disease Activity Index (PCDAI) ≤ 10 with no clinical symptoms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Receiving a stable dose for at least 4 weeks of any of the following drugs: Thiopurines, Methotrexate, or TNF-α inhibitors (Infliximab/Adalimumab)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of surgery resulting in a permanent colostomy or ileostomy (because of the inability to calculate PCDAI at baseline)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have already been included in the pilots vitamin D trials
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients actively enrolled in other CD drug trials
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and is receiving Bisphosphonate therapy. Their sister had the same problems.
